Text: There is no sign of the National Guard. Creatures are tearing up the city. Many people eaten alive! They're coming! Let's get out of here! Open the door! Open the door! Mom? I know. Here, too. Mom, listen to me, you need to get up and lock the door to your room, okay? Don't let anyone in. Not the nurses... Mom? Mom! So now we've had time to see what death looks like. The question for all of you is... ...how did he die? Now remember, the patient first complained of a sore throat... ...a fever and a cough. Considering these factors, can you find this man's cause of death? So, any of you got a theory on C.O.D. based off this information? Syphilis? Nice try, Abby, but I don't think syphilis infects the lungs. Peter. Suzie? Influenza. Correct. Now, what strain is it, Zoe? It has to be H1N5. Close. H1N1. Note the collapsed air sacs. They couldn't inflate, so they couldn't provide oxygen. That's what killed him. Oh, don't worry, Zoe. You're not being graded today. Hey, doc. Any chance you wanna come to the end of the semester's fiesta? What, and go drinking with my students? Think I'll pass. Have fun. - You're coming, right? - No, you go ahead.
